EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-06-Field-East-ESB-DC.ES-2018-02-15 Marketing Invitation 2.EMAIL - Ma
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Washington Wizards vs Miami Heat
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Ben Nye, Chief Executive Officer at Turbonomic, we'd like to cordially invite you to an exclusive networking event followed by a basketball game at the Miami Heat take on the Washington Wizards on March 6th at the Capital One Arena.
Executive Networking Series Washington D.C. Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud Washington Wizards vs Miami Heat Tuesday, March 6th | Capital One Arena | 5:30 p.m.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-district/]]>
Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads happy. While you can't automate people, your can automate workloads, and accelerate business growth Join your peers for the next stop in our Executive Networking Series to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud. Following our cocktail hour and presentation, we'll take our seats in the Turbonomic Suite. We hope you'll be able to join us and Cisco on March 6th at 5:30 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/exec-district <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-district/]]>
See you there,
The Turbonomic Team
